name: Time Maze
description:
High Quality Graphics, sounds that bring passion to the game.

Smooth and easy controls by tilting the phone. Fun & intuitive gameplay.

KEY FEATURES:

• Play 3 different boards with different difficulty.
• Beat yourself with this challenging game.
• Great graphics and realistic physics.
• Simple and intuitive control: Control the steel ball by tilting the phone.
• High Score Table for each difficulty.
• Totally free.
• No ads.
• No In App Purchases.

Get Maze Time NOW!
Created by ZombiSoft.
